So, this is a really popular phrase that I

that you choose regularly or this is your
regular choice.
Now, I am very indecisive.

"Indecisive" means I have a very difficult
time making a decision or choosing something.

I have my go-to wine.
This is my go-to wine.

It's my choice.

This means this is what I usually cook
